title: Second Line - Featuring Dawn Richard
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week’s episode of #TheFriendZone, we’re joined by the one and only - Dawn Richard. We talk about the challenges of being an independent artist, what inspires her creations, Danity Kane, Diddy Dirty Money, The Encore on BET and so much more.

THE FRIEND ZONE IS ON PATREON! Sign up now to catch our 4 spin-off shows (with audio, video and BTS images) and Livestream Tour: www.patreon.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Black Business of the Week - State of Black Music Podcast brought to you by The National Museum of African American Music in partnership with The City of Nashville: Hosted by Claude Kelly & Chuck Harmony https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/state-of-black-music/id1573994539

Thank you to our Sponsors:
Headspace - You deserve to feel happier, and Headspace is meditation made simple. Go to https://www.headspace.com/FRIENDZONE for a free ONE-MONTH trial with access to Headspace’s full library of meditations for every situation. 

Honey - Get Honey for FREE at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE 

Nurx - You deserve to live a migraine-free life. Go to https://www.nurx.com to get started. 

Talkspace - Match with a licensed therapist when you go to https://www.talkspace.com. Get one hundred dollars off your first month with the promo code ZONE. 

Target - This week’s Black Business of The Week is presented by Target. Target invests in building a legacy of success. Let’s rise together. Discover more at https://www.target.com/black-beyond-measure 

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/thefriendzonepodcast
Discord - https://discord.gg/Jee2cwfAdz

Have a GREAT day!
